Ctrl K

Navigation

Help Center

Add a new portal

POST

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

portals

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request POST \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/portals \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "color": "#FFFFFF",
  "custom_domain": "chatwoot.help",
  "header_text": "Handbook",
  "homepage_link": "https://www.chatwoot.com/",
  "name": "Handbook",
  "page_title": "Handbook",
  "slug": "handbook",
  "archived": false,
  "config": {
    "allowed_locales": [\
      "en",\
      "es"\
    ],
    "default_locale": "en"
  }
}'
```

200

403

Copy

```
{
  "payload": [\
    {\
      "id": 123,\
      "archived": true,\
      "color": "<string>",\
      "config": {\
        "allowed_locales": [\
          {\
            "code": "<string>",\
            "articles_count": 123,\
            "categories_count": 123\
          }\
        ]\
      },\
      "custom_domain": "<string>",\
      "header_text": "<string>",\
      "homepage_link": "<string>",\
      "name": "<string>",\
      "slug": "<string>",\
      "page_title": "<string>",\
      "account_id": 123,\
      "inbox": {\
        "id": 123,\
        "name": "<string>",\
        "website_url": "<string>",\
        "channel_type": "<string>",\
        "avatar_url": "<string>",\
        "widget_color": "<string>",\
        "website_token": "<string>",\
        "enable_auto_assignment": true,\
        "web_widget_script": "<string>",\
        "welcome_title": "<string>",\
        "welcome_tagline": "<string>",\
        "greeting_enabled": true,\
        "greeting_message": "<string>",\
        "channel_id": 123,\
        "working_hours_enabled": true,\
        "enable_email_collect": true,\
        "csat_survey_enabled": true,\
        "auto_assignment_config": {},\
        "out_of_office_message": "<string>",\
        "working_hours": [\
          {\
            "day_of_week": 123,\
            "closed_all_day": true,\
            "open_hour": 123,\
            "open_minutes": 123,\
            "close_hour": 123,\
            "close_minutes": 123,\
            "open_all_day": true\
          }\
        ],\
        "timezone": "<string>",\
        "callback_webhook_url": "<string>",\
        "allow_messages_after_resolved": true,\
        "lock_to_single_conversation": true,\
        "sender_name_type": "<string>",\
        "business_name": "<string>",\
        "hmac_mandatory": true,\
        "selected_feature_flags": {},\
        "reply_time": "<string>",\
        "messaging_service_sid": "<string>",\
        "phone_number": "<string>",\
        "medium": "<string>",\
        "provider": "<string>"\
      },\
      "logo": {\
        "id": 123,\
        "portal_id": 123,\
        "file_type": "<string>",\
        "account_id": 123,\
        "file_url": "<string>",\
        "blob_id": 123,\
        "filename": "<string>"\
      },\
      "meta": {\
        "all_articles_count": 123,\
        "archived_articles_count": 123,\
        "published_count": 123,\
        "draft_articles_count": 123,\
        "categories_count": 123,\
        "default_locale": "<string>"\
      }\
    }\
  ]
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-color)

color

string

Header color for help-center in hex format

Example:

`"#FFFFFF"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-custom-domain)

custom\_domain

string

Custom domain to display help center.

Example:

`"chatwoot.help"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-header-text)

header\_text

string

Help center header

Example:

`"Handbook"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-homepage-link)

homepage\_link

string

link to main dashboard

Example:

`"https://www.chatwoot.com/"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-name)

name

string

Name for the portal

Example:

`"Handbook"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-page-title)

page\_title

string

Page title for the portal

Example:

`"Handbook"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-slug)

slug

string

Slug for the portal to display in link

Example:

`"handbook"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-archived)

archived

boolean

Status to check if portal is live

Example:

`false`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#body-config)

config

object

Configuration about supporting locales

Example:

```
{
  "allowed_locales": ["en", "es"],
  "default_locale": "en"
}
```

#### Response

200

200403

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#response-payload)

payload

object\[\]

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#response-id)

id

integer

archived

boolean

Whether the portal is archived

color

string

The color code for the portal

config

object

Configuration settings for the portal

inbox.enable\_auto\_assignment

inbox.web\_widget\_script

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#response-inbox-welcome-title)

inbox.welcome\_title

string

inbox.welcome\_tagline

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#response-inbox-greeting-enabled)

inbox.greeting\_enabled

boolean

The flag which shows whether greeting is enabled

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#response-inbox-greeting-message)

inbox.greeting\_message

string

A greeting message when the user starts the conversation

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#response-inbox-channel-id)

inbox.channel\_id

number

ID of the channel this inbox belongs to

inbox.working\_hours\_enabled

boolean

The flag which shows whether working hours feature is enabled

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-portal#response-inbox-enable-email-collect)

inbox.enable\_email\_collect

boolean

The flag to enable collecting email from contacts

inbox.csat\_survey\_enabled

inbox.auto\_assignment\_config

inbox.out\_of\_office\_message

inbox.working\_hours

object\[\]

day\_of\_week

number

closed\_all\_day

boolean

number

number

open\_all\_day

boolean

Whether the inbox is open for the entire day

inbox.timezone

string

Timezone configuration for the inbox

inbox.callback\_webhook\_url

string

inbox.allow\_messages\_after\_resolved

inbox.lock\_to\_single\_conversation
